survey_responses.What do you think your life might be lik: After 30 years I will be around 55 and would have worked very hard in my life. I want that I get a good life equal to the hard work I have done, not only for me but I can give a good life to my parents and my future generations too. Today, only one thing comes to mind about life after 30 years, that I will have to fulfill my needs according to my age and in what condition I will live, it is difficult for me to think about that. I will definitely say one thing that at that time I want to live in my country.
survey_responses.What is another dangerous outcome you ca: AI technology, particularly that related to data analysis and surveillance, can violate privacy. For example, facial recognition systems can be used to track individuals without their consent, raising concerns about surveillance and the misuse of personal data.
survey_responses.What is another positive outcome you can:
AI has also improved the field of education. AI-based tutoring systems and intelligent educational software can provide personalized assistance to students according to their need. This makes the learning experience more interactive and effective for students.

AI is also being used in agriculture. AI-based drones and sensors can help monitor crop conditions, detect pests and diseases, and increase crop yields. This helps farmers make better decisions and improves the efficiency of agriculture.
survey_responses.What are the first decisions in your lif: AI can be used to monitor financial transactions and detect fraud. It can recognize transaction patterns and report suspicious activities immediately.
survey_responses.Describe a concrete scenario where you w:
Accident decisions in self-autonomous vehicles.

Explanation: If an autonomous vehicle is faced with an accident situation, the AI ​​has to decide which option to choose—should it let the vehicle crash into a wall, or take risks to avoid hitting pedestrians on the road. In such cases, the ethics of the decision are debated and the AI's ability to make ethical decisions may be limited.
survey_responses.Explain what makes one of these scenario:
C
"I don't know anything more about it."
Both of these options represent the same type of problems.
survey_responses.What is ONE specific ethical or moral pr:
Morality: Morality means following good conduct and moral values. It includes honesty, respect for others, and maintaining moral values.

Truthfulness: Truthfulness and honesty are considered very important. This principle teaches that maintaining truth in your words and actions builds trust and credibility in personal and professional relationships.

Patience: Patience is essential to face life's challenges and delays. This principle teaches that difficulties should be overcome with patience.
survey_responses.What is one ethical or moral principle,: Truth and honesty are considered very important. This principle teaches that maintaining truth in your words and actions builds trust and credibility in personal and professional relationships.
survey_responses.What do you consider your culture? What: I believe that traditions are important in maintaining our cultural identity and connecting us to our past. My favourite thing is that traditions give us the opportunity to form deeper connections with family and community, especially during festivals and rituals, moments of shared joy and togetherness.
survey_responses.What is one unique perspective that your: In the future I would like to keep the tradition of “Spiritual Sadhana” alive. This tradition guides us towards spiritual peace, meditation, and self-realization. Daily practice of meditation and yoga not only brings mental peace but also develops a sense of balance and devotion in life. By maintaining this tradition we can recognize our inner energy and live a more peaceful and empowered life.
survey_responses.What kinds of cultural things would you: There is a deep concern about the extinction of Indian traditions as it may endanger our cultural identity and heritage. Traditions, which are a collection of experiences and knowledge of our ancestors, are the foundation of our society. If these traditions get extinct, we may be cut off from our cultural roots and future generations may be deprived of their historical and cultural values. It is not only the fear of losing our identity but also the sense of harmony and unity in society may diminish.
survey_responses.What is the biggest problem in your life:
If a direct solution to the problem is found, such as better financial management for economic problems or treatment for health problems, it means that the problem is solved.
When the person gets mental peace after solving the problem and feels free from anxiety or stress, it is a sign that the problem is solved. If positive results are achieved after the problem is solved, such as better health, stronger relationships, or professional success, it is also a sign that the problem is solved.
survey_responses.What would you consider giving your life: When we spend more time with our family and friends, it improves our mental and emotional health. This time strengthens our relationships and makes us feel secure and loved. Time spent with family and friends gives us the opportunity to share new experiences, which makes life even richer. In this way, we understand that the most important things are our relationships and affection, which provide real happiness and satisfaction in life.
survey_responses.What is something unique, that other peo: For me, the most unique aspect of life is that I find deep joy in the little things, while so often people focus on big goals and accomplishments. I find joy and satisfaction in the simple joys of every day—like a sweet smile, a beautiful sunset, or a genuine conversation with someone. This perspective helps me realize the depth and beauty of life that many people may overlook. It is these little joys that make life truly special and meaningful."
survey_responses.What are you most scared will be true in: My biggest concern about the future is whether I will be able to maintain balance in different aspects of life. In today's fast-changing world, it can be challenging to maintain a balance between professional and personal life. I fear that I may fall behind in adapting to technological and professional changes and also fail to prioritize family and health. I worry whether I will be able to accomplish my goals and lead a balanced, happy life.
survey_responses.If you could make world leaders understa: I would like to tell the world political leaders that preservation of cultural heritage and traditions is extremely important. These traditions are an integral part of a society's identity and historical knowledge. Their extinction may not only be a cultural loss but also a threat to the diversity and unity of humanity. We must make efforts to appreciate and preserve these traditions at the global level, so that future generations can also experience these invaluable heritages and preserve our cultural values.
survey_responses.Lastly, is there anything you felt you c: You did not appreciate my culture much in your questions, due to which I was not able to give complete information properly. I am sorry.
